lead_paragraph: Kyle Hendricks began the season as the Cubs' No. 5 starter. He's on pace to finish it as the major league's ERA leader and — if manager Joe Maddon has his way — potentially with an even bigger trophy.

headline.print_headline: Hendricks Lowers ERA to 2.09 as Cubs Top Pirates 3-0
headline.main: Hendricks Lowers ERA to 2.09 as Cubs Top Pirates 3-0

snippet: Kyle Hendricks began the season as the Cubs' No. 5 starter. He's on pace to finish it as the major league's ERA leader and — if manager Joe Maddon has his way — potentially with an even bigger trophy....
